properties.areaDesc: Manitou Island to Point Isabelle MI
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 8 at 10:56AM EST until January 9 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Marquette MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 kt with gusts up to 40 kt and
waves 8 to 13 feet expected.

* WHERE...Manitou Island to Point Isabelle MI.

* WHEN...From 4 AM to 7 PM EST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 7 PM EST THURSDAY... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 11 AM EST THIS MORNING
